data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think that parents have different standards and ambitions for their daughters than they do for their sons? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: Although sexism is an existed fact, I personally believe that the majority of people have recognized that men and women are equal. It means that all parents should treat their children equally and there should not be any discrimination towards their children regardless of their gender. Therefore, parents or caregivers should set the same standards and have the same expectations for each of their children.
